headline: Everkind, An AI-Powered Life Coach, Announces Closing of $3,000,000 Financing and the Formation of the Everkind Foundation
summary: Toronto, Ontario--(Newsfile Corp. - January 6, 2026) - Everkind Inc. ("Everkind" or the "Company"), a pioneering wellness platform, raised an additional $3 million to advance its mission of redefining mental health support through intelligent, emotionally attuned technology. The Company has built an exceptional advisory board and leadership team, drawing talent from global organizations including Amazon, Google, Expedia, and Check Point—as well as top experts in clinical care and public safety..
